entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
